channel.title: CVE Feed for moveaddons -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for moveaddons -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-47396|2024-10-01T14:09:42.880Z -- moveaddons -- move%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in moveaddons Move Addons for Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Move Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 1.3.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-30525|2024-08-02T01:38:59.839Z -- moveaddons -- move%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in moveaddons Move Addons for Elementor.This issue affects Move Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 1.2.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-4695|2024-08-01T20:47:41.587Z -- moveaddons -- move%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: The Move Addons for Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via multiple widgets in all versions up to, and including, 1.3.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-30525|2024-06-20T17:55:10.044Z -- moveaddons -- move%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in moveaddons Move Addons for Elementor.This issue affects Move Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 1.2.9.

item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in moveaddons Move Addons for Elementor.This issue affects Move Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 1.2.9.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Moveaddons Move Addons for Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Move Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 1.3.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-4695|2024-06-06T19:51:18.396Z -- moveaddons -- move%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: The Move Addons for Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via multiple widgets in all versions up to, and including, 1.3.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
